headline: Comcast Corporation (CMCSA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Comcast Corporation on Lame’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CMCSA. Comcast Corporation’s share was trading at $33.81 as of August 27th. CMCSA’s trailing and forward P/E were 5.61 and 7.97 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Comcast Corporation stands as a diversified media and telecommunications […]

headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Football Returns, Ad Dollars Pour In
summary: NBCUniversal already sold all of its advertising inventory for Super Bowl LX. American Eagle Outfitters soars as Sydney Sweeney campaign pays off. Gold reaches another record high.
